caption: friendly staff. The delivery was very quick and all foods are delicious!
A preferred spot for delicious American food. Food was so appetizing. The place has a great atmosphere.

If you want food that's both healthy and delicious, look no further. The portion sizes are enormous and represent tremendous value and a lot of bang for your buck. Ingredients are very fresh and tasty. I will certainly return here because it's just too good of a deal to miss out on.
Pretty good food and great staff but, name is not as shown here. Called Pizza Capri now with same menu.
Came here on a date, love the environment. The food was great, the staff are very friendly. I'll definitely be coming back
This place is great. The food is awesome and all the people who work there are very friendly. I love going to this Italian Restaurant.

I placed an order for Zig Zag kitchen yesterday. I requested it be delivered to a doctor’s office this afternoon. The food arrived on-time, however, the chicken dish tasted...for lack of a better word, terrible. It was very bland, not seasoned, and the pasta tasted and looked like it was swimming in water.  The half tray of chicken picatta cost $63.00. $63.00 of which I believe I should be reimbursed. The office staff, as well as myself, couldn’t eat any more than a bite.  The staff said they have ordered from Zig Zag kitchen prior to my visit, and it has been delicious. Which is why they specifically requested it for today’s lunch.  I called and spoke with a manager. I couldn’t be more unhappy with my experience. He said that the chicken dish was made in bulk and sent to 3 other places for lunch and nobody else complained about the taste. Which to me, means nothing. Just because people aren’t calling to complain about taste doesn’t mean it doesn’t taste bad. It also disregards my experience, as well as the office staff, being unable to eat the food made in their kitchen. The manager also said that they’ve probably ordered from another restaurant before, inferring why it tastes different. Still, no justification. Plus, why be okay with YOUR restaurant’s food tasting bad and another’s tasting good.  He then said he would get food delivered there tomorrow (in redemption of the food today), then he looked up the address and took back his gesture. Said it was too far and didn’t recognize the address.  To top it off, my receipt that needs to be expensed says “country’s best pizza Inc.” - not Zig Zag kitchen (the way it’s advertised on their website).  Safe to say, I will never be ordering from here again due to the food not being good and very poor customer service.
Usually love the food but they have just changed the receipe so much!! This is one of my favorite dishes but instead of being creamy so watered down.
I love the hummus, my son loves the bbq chicken salad & bbq chicken pizza. I wish they still sold the mango salmon salad...

We're totally adding Zig Zag Kitchen into our rotation of food spots after tonight. My Lime Chicken Cilantro Salad hit the spot! Husband loved his meal too, and the Southwestern Egg Rolls we shared were great. Delivery was quick, food was yum. Can't wait to try more from the menu. NOTE: This is the same restaurant as Pizza Capri
The best place to go before a Steppenwolf play!  Inexpensive; everything is tasty;  vegetarian-friendly; lots of healthy options;  big windows overlooking the street.
